com.googlecode.wicketelements.library.behavior
Class AttributeModifierFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.wicketelements.library.behavior.AttributeModifierFactory

public final class AttributeModifierFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory to create an attribute modifier for various attributes.

Author:
Yannick LOTH

newAttributeAppenderForAlt

public static org.apache.wicket.AttributeModifier newAttributeAppenderForAlt(java.lang.String altText)
Instanciates a new attribute modifier for the attribute alt.

Parameters:
altText - The name of the alt text to add to the tag. Must not be blank.
Returns:
The new attribute modifier.
